TN.content: proper, ipseity, proche, “same” are all deconstructible [but try to speak w/out them!], beyond their pedagogical and rhetorical necessity, what do they ever mean? the law that hatches irresistible desire of appropriation (“my body,” “here”) destines it to expropriation > this desire handed over to promise of expropriation [Derrida is deconstructing Nancy’s “properly”]
